DOC.brief_summary: This study examined how well elementary students demonstrated motor skill competency as a result of participating in the evidence-based quality physical education program and investigated relationships between levels of health-related physical fitness and physical activity in school-aged children.
DOC.brief_title: Relationship of Motor Skill Competency and Physical Fitness to Physical Activity in Elementary School Students
DOC.criteria: K5 th grade students who are enrolled in 9 elementary schools in Southeast Michigan.
